item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

item.title: Home Example V
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row custom_background="custom" bg_image="2511" parallax="yes" padding="200px 0" el_class="no-margin-top"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

The BEST WordPress Photography Theme!

Five Star Rating
  [icon name="fa-star" iconsize="medium"  ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="medium"  ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="medium"  ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="medium"  ][icon name="fa-star" iconsize="medium"  ] Available on ThemeForest with free Updates & Support
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="100px 0"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Showcase your photography in incredible ways!

 

ePix is a responsive fullscreen Photography WordPress theme, perfect for photographers looking to showcase work on a professional platform. Loaded with a ton of new features unique to ePix, including the Fullscreen slider, stunning galleries, client login, advanced live Skin Editor, Visual Page Builder, Parallax, boxed or full-width site layout and so much more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="inherit" padding="50px 0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405437896913{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Don't Be Afraid, Click the Galleries!

 

Fullscreen Slider + 3d Carousel Slider + Stage Slider + Grid Gallery + Group Slider

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][imageeffect image="2502" type="circular frame" zoomhover="zoomhover" width="400" height="400" align="aligncenter" alt="Fullscreen Slider" titleoverlay="yes" overlay_state="static" link="http://epix.themeva.com/home" target="_blank"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][imageeffect image="2504" type="circular frame" zoomhover="zoomhover" width="400" height="400" align="aligncenter" alt="Grid Gallery" titleoverlay="yes" overlay_state="static" link="http://epix.themeva.com/grid/" target="_blank"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][imageeffect image="2508" type="circular frame" zoomhover="zoomhover" width="400" height="400" align="aligncenter" alt="Carousel Slider" titleoverlay="yes" overlay_state="static" link="http://epix.themeva.com/carousel/" target="_blank"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][imageeffect image="2507" type="circular frame" zoomhover="zoomhover" width="400" height="400" align="aligncenter" alt="Group Slider" titleoverlay="yes" overlay_state="static" link="http://epix.themeva.com/group-slider/" target="_blank"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][imageeffect image="2503" type="circular frame" zoomhover="zoomhover" width="400" height="400" align="aligncenter" alt="Stage Slider" titleoverlay="yes" overlay_state="static" link="http://epix.themeva.com/stage/" target="_blank"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="100px 0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405362456822{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

ePix isn't just a Photography theme it's a Multi-Purpose e-Commerce theme too!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405439730478{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Your website should be a statement and reflect your photographs, so what better way than to display your work using the best photography theme on the market. Need a client login? ePix also allows you to password protect your galleries and pages too – allowing your clients to login to view their photo.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][button title="Take the Tour" type="linkbutton" color="link_color" icon="fa-arrow-circle-o-right" align="aligncenter" target="_blank" css_animation="top-to-bottom" el_class="big-text" url="http://epix.themeva.com/tour/"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="inherit" padding="100px 0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405439741547{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Check out what others are doing are doing with ePix!

 

Click the cog on the right and try out the Layout & Skin editor to instantly change the design of the site. ePix isn’t just limited to a few designs and layouts, let your imagination run free and create your own!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding="100px 0"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1405461028289{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]
